name: Sandstorm (itch) (LighthouseStudios)
description:
Note: This game is still under development. By downloading this you will receive a free demo of the game so far. This demo will be nowhere near as complete as the full game, that will be available for £5.

Sandstorm is a story-rich game set within the harsh desserts. You control a cowboy called José, who you get to know along the journey, as well as many other characters. There are many features in the gameplay that you would find in a  sidescroller platformer.

You will go on a mystery filled expedition through a variety of terrain, from lush savannahs to towering mountains.  Along the way, you will be exposed to puzzles, dialogues, cutscenes, and much more. 

Join our discord server for updates, bug reports, and prototypes!
